frontmatter.title: Senior Web3 Full Stack Blockchain Engineer

node.html:
• Fixed and maintained galaxy website using web3 and ethers.js,
  • Developed from scratch space id domain website so that user can register domain on bnb network,
  • Integrate with blockchain system using web3.
  • Developed smart contract code and test it in testnet and publish it to mainnet.

• Developed main website using next.js and optimized website,
  • Took part in web user website development for user's wallet,
  • Fix issues and maintained staking website.

• Developed car leasing website using react.js,
  • Maintained website and integrated with backend,
  • Improved loading speed by restructuring the project and optimized website,
  • Upgraded using next.js for resolving SEO issues in SPA.

• Developed main website using MERN stack (autoez.com),
  • Developed chat component which can be embedded in other websites using MERN stack and websocket,
  • Developed dealer's support admin website which can interact with chat component for the customers.

• Worked as a full-stack developer in a team for developing car leasing platform, cryptocurrency platforms using MERN stack, React Native, Electron and GraphQL,
  • Developed dashboard using D3.js for showing all the stats for the dealers, and coin rate changes etc,
  • Developed test code using JEST and test modules for React and Vue.js,
  • Worked on developing wallet app of the pastel coin using electron, react and tailwindcss.

• Developed main website using next.js and optimized website,
  • Took part in web user website development for user's wallet,
  • Fix issues and maintained staking website.
